column6: The mansion and its new young residents get a shake-up when a member of the original New Mutants team comes home. But Rahne Sinclair - a.k.a. WOLFSBANE - is not the sweet little girl she used to be. Also, can the Xavier Institute help a mutant girl who has been living homeless on the streets of Salem Center?,2004,432 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | penciller:Carlo Barberi | writer:Weir DeFilippis | inker:Juan Vlasco
